# chariot
A true [wanderword](Wanderword), unsurprising since the spoked chariot was invented only once. It quickly conquered every nation, in a very rapid fashion called the *seima-turbino phenomenon*, bringing metallurgy to [china](china) and the Hyksos to Egypt.
